histogram.name: Scanning.NumDetectedScanners
histogram.summary: Records the number of detected scanners. Recorded each time detected scanners are received.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumPagesScanned
histogram.summary: Records the number of pages scanned in a successful scan.

histogram.name: Scanning.NumScanSettingChanges
histogram.summary: Records the number of scan setting changes before a scan is initiated.

histogram.name: Scanning.ReadyTime
histogram.summary: Records the time between sending a request for scanners and receiving capabilities for the selected scanner, which is essentially the time between the user launching the Scan app and being able to interact with it to select a scanner, change scan settings, or start a scan.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanAppEntryPoint
histogram.summary: Records the entry point of where the Scan App was launched from in Chrome OS. Used to track the relative entry points of the app.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanCompleteAction
histogram.summary: Records the action taken by a user after a successful scan job on Chrome OS.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobFailureReason
histogram.summary: Records the reason a scan job failed.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.ColorMode
histogram.summary: Records the selected Color Mode setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.FileType
histogram.summary: Records the selected File Type setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.PageSize
histogram.summary: Records the selected Page Size setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.Resolution
histogram.summary: Records the selected Resolution setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSettings.Source
histogram.summary: Records the selected Source setting for a submitted scan job.

histogram.name: Scanning.ScanJobSuccessful
histogram.summary: Records true if the attempted scan job completed successfully and false if the scan job failed for any reason. This metric will not include canceled scan jobs.
